channel.title: general Tor and anonymity talk forum deactivated
channel.description:
I've set the general Tor and anonymity talk forum to read-only just now. (Similar to previously https://forums.whonix.org/t/off-topic-forum-deactivated/2117)
Sorry the the inconvenience!
Old posts are still available for backup on request for at least 1 month.
Exiting posts that seem fitting in other categories will be moved there in near future. Examples:
* move https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-competitors-orchid-protocol-mainframe-obsidian-skrumble-dusk-marconi-loki/6122 to development forum * move https://forums.whonix.org/t/how-dangerous-is-javascipt/8194 to support
You can also request one or another forum thread to be moved sooner than later if these shall be discussed sooner than later.
Reasons:
* increasing legal risks, increasingly hostile environment for free speech, [personal liability](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Limitations_on_Free_Speech_on_Whonix_Website#Personal_Liability) that nobody is ready to carry. * It is also an advancement of [Free Support Principle](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle). Some questions such as for example [this question](https://forums.whonix.org/t/is-it-safe-to-use-single-purpose-non-private-browsing-instances/9185) can be redirected to the appropriate upstream project.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Limitations_on_Free_Speech_on_Whonix_Website

item.title: general Tor and anonymity talk forum deactivated
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I’ve set the general Tor and anonymity talk forum to read-only just now. (Similar to previously off-topic forum deactivated)

Sorry the the inconvenience!

Old posts are still available for backup on request for at least 1 month.

Exiting posts that seem fitting in other categories will be moved there in near future. Examples:

  • move Tor competitors - Orchid Protocol, Mainframe, Obsidian, Skrumble, Dusk, Marconi, Loki to development forum
  • move How dangerous is javascipt? to support

You can also request one or another forum thread to be moved sooner than later if these shall be discussed sooner than later.

Reasons:

  • increasing legal risks, increasingly hostile environment for free speech, personal liability that nobody is ready to carry.
  • It is also an advancement of Free Support Principle. Some questions such as for example this question can be redirected to the appropriate upstream project.
whonix.org – 26 Mar 20

Whonix Website Free Speech Limitations - Whonix

Free Speech Limitations on the Whonix ™ Website

Read full topic
item.source: general Tor and anonymity talk forum deactivated
